protein.specific_function: Catalyzes a salvage reaction resulting in the formation of AMP, that is energically less costly than de novo synthesis.

go_class.description: nucleobase, nucleoside, nucleotide and nucleic acid metabolic process
nucleobase, nucleoside and nucleotide metabolic process
